bike.description: Alpha Platinum Aluminum, ABP Convert DH, Full Floater, E2 tapered head tube, integrated frame protection, internal control routing, alloy EVO Link, Mino Link, 210mm travel

Bontrager Rhythm Elite Low Riser, 31.8mm, 15mm rise
